snippet: A senior steward on Flight 86 claims that the airline and the government tried to coerce crew members into lying about an airline executive’s outburst over macadamia nuts.
abstract: Korean Air flight attendant Park Chang-jin accuses government of trying to cover up episode in which Park was kicked off plane when company executive Cho Hyan-ah, daughter of airline's chairman, had melt down over macadamia nuts.
lead_paragraph: A senior steward on Flight 86 claims that the airline and the government tried to coerce crew members into lying about an airline executive’s outburst over macadamia nuts.

headline.main: Flight Attendant Kicked Off Korean Air Flight Alleges Cover-Up
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Flight Attendant Accuses Airline of a Cover-Up Over a Tantrum
